name: Last One Standing: Paper Pumpkin Apocalypse
name_original: Last One Standing: Paper Pumpkin Apocalypse
description:
Made for GMC Jam 8 where the theme was "Disasters" and the handicap was "No Text".

A dark portal opens up to another world and unleashes a plague of paper pumpkins on an unsuspecting town!

Destroy as many pumpkins as you can before your inevitable demise.
